metadata.title: CVE-2019-3996 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: ELOG 3.1.4-57bea22 and below can be used as an HTTP GET request proxy whenunauthenticated remote attackers send crafted HTTP POST requests.

criterions.comment: elog: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
